Anti-glare lenses – Add lenses that reduce glare from computers and screens, reducing eye strain during long hours of work.
GPS navigation system integration – Incorporate GPS technology that can provide directions and navigate to the wearer's specific location.

Smart technology features – Include sensors and cameras to detect the wearer's surroundings, such as traffic signals or obstacles, warning them with vibrating alerts or vibrations.
